Description: Painted blue glazed composition shabti of ʿ-... nbt pr with a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black features, a black collar and joined hands in relief outlined in black holding two black hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a black representation of a seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots; the foot section has broken away.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (possibly)
